name: Sun Life Direct - Life Insurance
overview:
Sun Life Direct is a Life Insurance company working alongside the AXA Wealth Group.

You might find it reassuring to know that Sun Life Direct is part of the AXA Wealth business. The Sun Life name has been around for over 200 years and has roots stretching all the way back to 1810,when we opened our very first office building opposite the Bank of England in London. This is where the story of Sun Life began. In 1900, we became the first company to offer life assurance without the need for a medical – something we’re still proud to be offering today.

The leading provider of over 50s life cover Since the very first over 50s life cover plan was introduced in 1979, the team at Sun Life Direct have gained an extensive knowledge of over 50s customers. Over the years, we’ve helped thousands of people plan for the future and today, the Guaranteed Over 50 Plan is the nation’s most popular choice for over 50 plans.
